title: Limits
text: As $$t$$ approaches $$\infty$$, what does the expression $$e^{-0.7 t}$$ approach?
speech: As  t  approaches  infinity , what does the expression , e raised to the negative 0.7 t power  approach?

title: Simplification

title: Population Size
text: After the previous simplification, what does the N(t) approach as $$t$$ tends to $$\infty$$? We observe that as $$t$$ tends to $$\infty$$, everyone in the town would hear of the rumor, thus N(t) which models the number of people in town that heard the rumor would tells us how many people there are in the town.
